IClientConnection - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.client
connection interface which is implemented by ClientRMI and ClientSocket
IClientListener - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.network
this interface's methods are called mainly by the server to communicate with the client via RMI (using ClientListenerGUI and ClientListenerTUI) or via Socket (using ServerSocketClientHandler)
